original_title: Lord of the Dance/Destroyer of Illusion
overview: The documentary focuses on the annual Mani Rimdu festival of Tibet and Nepal, an event which encapsulates the Himalayan Buddhist experience.
tagline: In the West, we think of magic as the art of creating illusions. For Tibetans, destroying illusions is the highest form of magic.
title: Lord of the Dance/Destroyer of Illusion
